Lyric:
[by:NickyRomero]
[00:17.47]I don't wanna fight right now
[00:19.69]Know you always right,
[00:21.96]Now I know I need you 'round with me
[00:24.03]But nobody waitin' 'round with me
[00:26.43]Been through the ups
[00:28.81]Yeah, the ups and the downs with me
[00:31.08]Got a whole lot of love
[00:33.17]But you don't wanna spread it 'round with me, yeah
[00:36.20]
[00:36.38]Never pick up, never call me
[00:38.45]You know we're runnin' out of time
[00:40.95]Never pick up when you want me
[00:43.12]Now I gotta draw a line
[00:45.60]Baby, I done, done enough talking
[00:47.64]Need to know that you're mine
[00:50.23]Baby, we done, done enough talking
[00:52.19]Gotta be right now, right now
[00:53.78]
[00:53.91]Baby, gon' love me now, now, now, now, now, now
[00:58.56]Now or never, hey, hey, hey
[01:02.98]I want you to hold me down, down, down, down, down, down
[01:07.68]Down forever, hey, hey, hey
[01:11.23]Said you know I wanna keep you around
[01:16.90]'Round forever, hey, hey, hey
[01:21.29]I want you to love me now, now, now, now, now, now
[01:25.99]Now or never
[01:28.31]
[01:48.80]I'm turnin' off the light right now
[01:51.07]I'm callin' it a night now
[01:53.76]Wishin' you were 'round with me
[01:55.56]But you're in a different town than me
[01:58.02]We've been through it all
[01:59.92]But you could never spit it out for me
[02:02.35]Tryna talk to a wall
[02:04.42]But you could never tear it down for me, yeah
[02:07.45]
[02:07.66]Never pick up, never call me
[02:09.93]You know we're runnin' out of time
[02:12.38]Never pick up when you want me
[02:14.47]Now I gotta draw a line
[02:16.98]Baby, I done, done enough talking
[02:19.33]Need to know that you're mine
[02:21.45]Baby, we done, done enough talking
[02:23.38]Gotta be right now, right now
[02:25.24]
[02:25.39]Baby, gon' love me now, now, now, now, now, now
[02:30.12]Now or never, hey, hey, hey
[02:34.33]I want you to hold me down, down, down, down, down, down
[02:39.16]Down forever, hey, hey, hey
[02:43.29]Said you know I wanna keep you around
[02:48.22]'Round forever, hey, hey, hey
[02:52.66]I want you to love me now, now, now, now, now, now
[02:57.50]Now or never
